metadata.title: CVE-2018-16081 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Allowing the chrome.debugger API to run on file:// URLs in DevTools inGoogle Chrome prior to 69.0.3497.81 allowed an attacker who convinced auser to install a malicious extension to access files on the local filesystem without file access permission via a crafted Chrome Extension.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
